Sinister slowly looks behind his back at Kit.....he laughs..... "a new
threat!....aww! just as i was about to kill my brother and his scorpion
friend you show up?...." he laughs and laughs and laughs.....he laughs
weirdly....because he's a maniac...... "i'll have to destroy you as
well......" he said....he threw a spin kick at her hand, aiming for her
weapon.....
----- Original Message -----
From: "Teltoli / Rexon" <teltoli@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, May 07, 2000 12:05 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> *Kit, a new female otter bot, popped her head out of the water as two bots
(SINESIS and SINISTER) fell into the lake, fighting, trying to kill each
other. She had been swimming to try and get to the Ark, looking for a fight,
but this was good!!*
>
> *The otter bot swims over to where the are and shouts* "SURPRISE!" *When
they continued fighting, she transforms, her natural floating abilites
keeping her up. She lifts up a gun*
>
> "Heeeeeyyyaaaaaaa!!!!" *She yells and aims it at the nearest one of them*
